Yoku no nai kibou ni mirai wa nai As if you are wandering looking only for water

You cannot stay pure if you want your dream to come true
Furenai unmei wo egakidasou Let us create an impossible fate
It is boring just waiting around
That is how you felt, right?
Yume wa jibun de ubaitsukamu diamond Your dreams are a diamond you have to take for yourself
It is our turn for challenge
Tomo ni tatte Let us stand together
Fumidashite mezasu kouya wo Take our first steps as we aim for the wasteland
At or on the further side of something.
You should have learned that word in middle school.
Combine that with the English word youth for the phrase beyond youth.
You are all in the midst of your age of youth.
Have you thought about what lies beyond youth?
Now that I remember, Nakajima made that awesome flip today in gym.
I cannot believe he made the landing on that triple twist flip.
Look, there is not enough consistency!
All that needs to be consistent are their lower halves!
Ugh, I am so done with this.
Um, you heading up to the club room, too, Ando-san?
A-are you all going to the club room?
Is it alright if I join you?
Yeah, I mean, we are going to the same place.
Today's really our release date, right?
It just has not fully hit me yet.
I have not felt it yet, either.
Oh, so everyone is feeling the same way!
I am like oh man, it is really on sale?
Um, that just now, was it...
It is just as I predicted.
All 3,000 of our initial units sold in an instant.
The shops are making additional orders.
I just finished up with ZEGA, they discussed a proposal for more production.
How much more do they want?
They said they would all sell right away.
So, combining that with the other numbers...
They sold out of all 4,000 of their initial order as well.
They had more straight from the beginning!
No, their repeat order is different.
We have a repeat order of 6,000.
9,000 versus 6,000, is not that kind of crazy?
Taiga, on the other hand, is a full-priced game.
The price difference may have influenced the difference in sales.
So we had the advantage from the start, just'because we went with sale numbers?
I did not know if we would win until today.
This is a direct result from our genuine hard work.
Damn, you prepped well for this, Kuroda.
After working hard, you have got to drink a cold one of these!
I want to have some skirt steak.
Then let us do the special cut.
What do you want to eat, Atomu?
I will have the beef tongue, I guess?
Is the salted beef tongue good?
Then let us get the special cut of all of that!
No, the special cut is too much...
Let us get the special cut.
It is way tougher than the top cut!
It is a seriously heavy cut!
T-then I will have the special green onion-stuffed cut.
Torry's way less hesitant than she used to be, huh?
At first you would be like...
I-I think everything is fine like this...
I think she was always like this.
Shyness and a lack thereof can coexist.
So you can have your cake and eat it, too?
Either way, it is good that you are more honest.
You take that to the extreme, though, Yuka.
You take that to the extreme, though, Yuka.
But man, there are not many teams out there that make it to the end
with everyone being honest and saying how they feel.
It is the rules of the wasteland.
If you did not want me to take it, you should have written your name on it.
C'mon, it is all cooked, so let us eat, okay?
Excuse me, we would like to put in an order.
Um, one skirt steak, kalbi, beef tongue, and a green onion stuffed...
The money you are making will go into your next work.
Thanks to all of you, I have started moving again.
That is all in the past for us.
Oh, that is right, hold on a sec!
Hopefully this makes up for it a little!
Uh, you could have it if you like.
You seem like a nice guy who would eat this kind of stuff.
Crap, he is reopening Atomu's old wounds!
Hey, uh, I will eat it!
Wow, I love veggies, they are so yummy!
She said she loved nice guys.
I am sorry my brother was so rude.
I do not want to see meat for a while.
I ate so much meat, there is no way they can call a vegetarian beta, yeah?
I am surprised you are not cold.
I am still surprised we actually won.
You did not think we would win?
Perhaps it was more dangerous for us in the long run than just on the day of release.
Asamori-san was written in an easygoing, everyday setting, so people are quick to pick it up.
On the other hand, Taiga is a game with a lot of depth,
so it will continue to sell hundreds of units every month.
There may not be many people talking about Asamori-san a year from now.
But Taiga might end up being a work that people are talking about many years down the line.
I have got to work harder, then.
This is just the beginning for us!
Actually, there was something I wanted to ask you all.
I was thinking of dissolving Rokuhara.
What happened to making two games?
I did not know that working together with people and making something could be so fun.
But it was so much more fun than I would thought.
That is why I want to put an end to everything the past me has done.
And I want to start over again.
I want to make a game from square one.
Why do not we make a game purely for ourselves this time?
It means exactly what it sounds like.
Instead of worrying about what will and will not sell,
let us make something we really want to make and enjoy making it.
Everyone puts in their input and decides on a project.
The deadline will be flexible, and we can really think the quality through.
And of course, this time I will make sure you are properly compensated.
Would you like to make a game with me once more?
I do not want to do it like that.
I cannot make a game with you in such a lukewarm manner.
I do not get why we have to pretend to be friends.
Now that I have debuted, my second work is pretty important!
I like having fun, but I do not know if I can handle no schedule.
I thought professionals did their best within their time limit?
But is that what you all want?
This world is a wasteland, is not it?!
That is why you cannot survive just doing what you want.
Only the ones with passion burning in their hearts can grasp their dreams in this cruel wasteland!
Did not you teach me that, Kuroda-san?
We will definitely win next time, too!
Let us all work hard together.
So let us do a BL game th-
Buntarou, did you hear the numbers?
Taiko-san's already started complaining about it.
She is making a big fuss about having to bow down to high schoolers.
Do you think it would be alright if I was the only one who-
I am really looking forward to Taiko-san bowing down to us.
You are more of a sadist than I thought.
About picking someone to join them.
How about you never ask that of us again?
Making people owe you is the best feeling ever.
Um, well, that is what my boss says, so I guess that settles it.
But all things aside, if you look at the script itself, I win, right?
I read a bunch of reviews, and mine had much higher ratings!
But I won the game, yeah?
I have no idea what you are talking about, Ohgi-san!
No, I am the one who does not understand you!
But there was a ridiculous ending to our battle.
No, I am the one who does not understand you!
But there was a ridiculous ending to our battle.
But there was a ridiculous ending to our battle.
A few days later, I checked the sales rankings on a big online store.
1st Wear LOVE: It feels best when you are wearing me!
2nd 24 Hours with Asamori-san 3rd The Taiga Betrayal
1st: Wear LOVE: It feels best when you are wearing me?!
What kind of game is that?
It is a sexy battle game where the main character gets turned into a suit of armor by a curse
and protects the heroine while also fighting evil.
That was written and produced by Hosokawa-san.
And it is hard to find in stores.
The game writer Hosokawa is huge in the media.
His game quickly got an anime adaptation,
and of course a manga and novel adaptation, and also a movie,
and an idol group was born from the project.
Another big project from producer and writer Blooters!
The world had a Hosokawa Fever like no other.
Things are kind of crazy, huh?
For various reason, I am going to have to fade away for a bit!
Sorry if it causes trouble for ya!
This is the Kawakado Editing department, is Hosokawa-san-
Hosokawa-san got a bit uppity and took on too many projects, then suddenly deflated,
and the Hosokawa Fever met its demise as quickly as it would begun.
Scary... and the Hosokawa Fever met its demise as quickly as it would begun.
and the Hosokawa Fever met its demise as quickly as it would begun.
You are the only one who has not turned it in.
Kuroda-san, I thought you would already gone up to the club room.
I was talking with our teacher.
Then let us head up together.
You cannot leave until you finish this!
Yeah, I was serious about it!
I-I am going to check it, okay?
Employment Plans I am still looking for one.
What is Hosokawa-san going to do from now on?
I do not think he is going to work for anyone for a while.
Trying to restore your name to what it was once it is gone down is really difficult.
That is the wasteland for you.
But suddenly returning and working as if nothing happened is also part of the wasteland.
Yuka Come up to the roof!
Marching forth in this land where there is no place for lip service.
I do not know what will make us keep on...
Or what is waiting for us in the distance...
Even if we do not know when it will fall apart...
No matter what little seams we tear apart...
